title: Lynda.com - MVC Frameworks for Building PHP Web Applications
description:
n this course, author Drew Falkman tours four open-source PHP frameworks: Zend, Symfony, CakePHP, and CodeIgniter. The course covers basic framework concepts; explores the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern as a means of simplifying, organizing, and maintaining code; and details the ins and outs of developing basic applications in each of the four frameworks. Exercise files accompany the course.

Topics include:

* Why use a framework?
* Exploring basic framework concepts
* Comparing Zend, Symfony, CakePHP, and CodeIgniter
* Downloading and installing each framework
* Exploring MVC in each framework
* Creating basic PHP projects
